description: Fashion, beauty, gifts, and other budget-friendly goodies worth grabbing.

html:
This Viral K-Beauty Brand

COSRX Snail Mucin Sheet Mask (10-Pack)

COSRX’s snail mucin essence is a certified hit on TikTok. Get in on the slugging trend with these sheet masks infused with the viral serum.

This Money-Saving Restock

MOON Midnight Enamel Care Whitening Toothpaste (2 Pack)

Now is the perfect opportunity to stock up on personal care products like toothpaste. This enamel-safe option helps whiten and brighten overnight.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Reveal and Conceal Top

Merokeety Mesh Sheer Long Sleeve Layering Top

Embrace the sheer trend with a lace top at a fraction of the price.

This Handy Gadget

Belkin Power Bank

It only takes being stranded somewhere without a charger to realize what a lifesaver a portable power bank is—not only is this one currently on super sale, but it also comes in tons of colors.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

This On-Trend Denim

Levi’s ’94 Baggy Jeans

Dare I say I found the perfect fall jeans for under $50 on Amazon? As a New Yorker, I’m partial to this classic black wash, but you’ve got over a dozen different options to choose from.

These Retro Runners

Reebok Glide Sneaker

If your white sneakers aren’t looking so white these days, trade them in for these retro Glide Sneakers from Reebok. Inspired by ’70s runners, they’re comfortable enough to walk for miles on end.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

This Dainty Ring

Ana Luisa Gold Twist Ring

Courtesy of ELLE editor-loved jewelry brand Ana Luisa, this delicate twist ring is plated in 14k gold and goes with everything.

This Editor-Loved Skincare Brand

First Aid Beauty Acne Spot Treatment Gel

Your skin deserves the best, and so does your wallet. Treat both right by taking 46 percent off this spot treatment gel.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

This Slick Bun Secret Weapon

Nexxus Hair Wax Slick Stick and Repair & Nourish Oil Bundle

This Slick Stick from Nexxus is my secret weapon for slick buns, ponytails, and updos—and apparently, it’s Sofia Richie Grainge’s too. The waxy pomade is strong enough to tame my frizzy baby hairs and doesn’t leave gunk behind after a good shampoo. Pick it up now and get the brand's nourishing oil as part of the package deal.

This Easy Acne Treatment

Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch Variety Pack

By now, you’ve probably tried zit stickers—but have you tried other sizes and shapes? Give Hero Cosmetics’ forehead, chin, and cheek patches a whirl while they're still on sale.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

These Shell Studs

Madewell Nautilus Mini Stud Earrings

Is it just me, or do these Madewell earrings look far more expensive than $17? Ideal for everyday wear, they're a fun way to keep summer going all year round.

This Reviewer-Loved Tech

Sony Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones

Prime Big Deal Days had some pretty amazing Apple deals, but you don’t need to spend that type of money to score a great pair of headphones. These reviewer-loved Sony headphones are still on sale for just $50.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

This Comfortable Bra

Calvin Klein Lightly Lined Triangle Bralette

“In the interest of public service, this bra is simply too good to gatekeep. It’s wildly comfortable, unnoticeable underneath T-shirts, and flattering all at the same time,” says Jaimie Potters, senior commerce manager. “With chocolate being the color of fall/winter 2024, I’ll be treating myself to one more this Prime Day.”

This Yummy Fall Scent

Homesick Pumpkin Picking Candle

Usher in fall with this pumpkin patch-inspired scent from Homesick. The notes of pumpkin pie spices and warm vanilla give it that fresh-baked goods smell without becoming cloying.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

This Hair Growth Serum

Spoiled Child A22 Biotin Boost Hair + Scalp Serum

If thinning hair is a top concern, add this biotin-infused hair growth serum to your beauty routine. Right now, you can take over 30 percent off the editor-approved brand’s hero product.

These Hygienic Wipes

Ourmed Life Disposable Face Towels (50 Count)

“I’m not saying that these single-use towelettes have single-handedly saved my skin, but I am saying that since I stopped washing my face with a regular towel, my breakouts have mostly stopped. They’re a good deal to begin with, but I’m using this sale to make sure I have a lifetime supply,” says Tatjana Freund, fashion and luxury commerce editor.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

This Dry Skin Cure

LOccitane Intensive Hand Balm

This ultra-nourishing hand cream has been a steadfast favorite of mine for combatting dry winter skin; and now, it's an extra 22 percent off.

This Travel-Friendly Styling Hack

Conair Handheld Garment Steamer

“This handheld Conair steamer comes highly recommended by the home experts at the Good Housekeeping Institute and is currently at the top of my wishlist, especially now that it’s on sale for under $50. It’s super compact for easily bringing in a carry-on, has a pivoting head for steaming at different angles, and even dual voltage power for compatibility overseas,” says Sam Peters, senior commerce editor. “I reckon this will be a lifesaver when I open up my vacuumed-bag wardrobe on my next big Euro trip.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

This Pretty Houseplant

Costa Farms Chinese Evergreen

Amazon’s live plant selection is incredibly underrated, IMHO. Whether I’m shopping for an easy housewarming gift or replacing something I accidentally killed, I can always find something on sale.

The Fall Essential

LILLUSORY Striped Cardigan

A striped sweater is always a smart investment, especially one that’s only $40.

Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
